subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city was declared as the second capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की दूसरी राजधानी के नामक नाम क्या है?
explanation_en:
Udaipur was declared as the second capital of Rajasthan. It is also known as the City of Lakes.
राजस्थान की दूसरी राजधानी है, यह लैक्स का भी नाम है।
